docs.snippet: The Audacity of Hope has downshifted to the Banality of Practicality....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Audacity of Hope has downshifted to the Banality of Practicality.
docs.abstract: Maureen Dowd Op-Ed column reflects on how Pres Obama upended Clinton machine in 2008, only to pave way for Hillary Clinton to take reins of presidency as his successor.

docs.snippet: Rounding up some of the notable things that were said at the Democratic National Convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rounding up some of the notable things that were said at the Democratic National Convention.
docs.abstract: Selection of quotations made during, or in commentary about, Democratic National Convention highlighted.

docs.snippet: Why the liberal mayor of New York was relegated to a minor role at the Democratic convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Why the liberal mayor of New York was relegated to a minor role at the Democratic convention.
docs.abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column observes embarrassingly minor role played by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio at Democratic National Convention; holds that while de Blasio's initial reluctance in endorsing Hillary Clinton certainly played role in his being relegated nearly to background of convention, much of blame is likely connected with perception of him as progressive, and somewhat arrogant, outlier in political world.

headline.main: Headliners in Philadelphia, and Bill de Blasio on the Sideline

docs.snippet: U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton accused Donald Trump on Sunday of scapegoating the parents of a Muslim soldier killed in Iraq, after the Republican nominee took issue with remarks the soldier's father made at the Democratic ...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton accused Donald Trump on Sunday of scapegoating the parents of a Muslim soldier killed in Iraq, after the Republican nominee took issue with remarks the soldier's father made at the Democratic National Convention.

headline.main: Clinton Accuses Trump of Scapegoating Muslim Soldier's Parents
headline.print_headline: Clinton Accuses Trump of Scapegoating Muslim Soldier's Parents

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton said Sunday that Donald Trump repaid the "ultimate sacrifice" of a U.S. Army captain killed in Iraq with insults and degrading comments about Muslims, as the soldier's bereaved father pressured Republican Party leaders to distance ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton said Sunday that Donald Trump repaid the "ultimate sacrifice" of a U.S. Army captain killed in Iraq with insults and degrading comments about Muslims, as the soldier's bereaved father pressured Republican Party leaders to distance themselves from the GOP presidential nominee.

headline.main: Clinton Accuses Trump of 'Degrading Comments About Muslims'
headline.print_headline: Clinton Accuses Trump of 'Degrading Comments About Muslims'

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton said on Sunday that Russian intelligence services hacked into Democratic National Committee computers and she questioned Republican rival Donald Trump's overtures to Russian President Vladimir Putin.

headline.main: Clinton Says Russia Behind DNC Hacking, Draws Line to Trump

docs.snippet: Republican candidate Donald Trump said he is unhappy with the dates set for this fall's presidential debates, but White House rival Hillary Clinton countered that the schedule was decided long ago and vowed to show up regardless of his objections....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican candidate Donald Trump said he is unhappy with the dates set for this fall's presidential debates, but White House rival Hillary Clinton countered that the schedule was decided long ago and vowed to show up regardless of his objections.

headline.main: Trump 'Not Thrilled' With Debate Dates, Clinton Vows 'to Be There'
headline.print_headline: Trump 'Not Thrilled' With Debate Dates, Clinton Vows 'to Be There'

docs.snippet: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton held a 6- percentage-point lead over Republican rival Donald Trump, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll with new wording that was released on Friday, the day after she formally accepted her party's n...
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton held a 6- percentage-point lead over Republican rival Donald Trump, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll with new wording that was released on Friday, the day after she formally accepted her party's nomination for the Nov. 8 election.

headline.main: Clinton Leads Trump by 6 Points After Democratic Confab: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.print_headline: Clinton Leads Trump by 6 Points After Democratic Confab: Reuters/Ipsos Poll

docs.snippet: Undermining democracies is part of Russia’s plan to extend its influence. The U.S. must push back....
docs.lead_paragraph: Undermining democracies is part of Russia’s plan to extend its influence. The U.S. must push back.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Michael A McFaul, former United States ambassador to Russian Federation, underscores necessity of US finding new ways to promote democracy abroad in order to respond to assault by Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin on democratic values; warns that world is looking to America for foreign policy leadership, noting with dismay empathy Donald Trump appears to have for Putin.

headline.main: How to Counter the Putin Playbook
